title: 6% A1C? It’s been five long years!
text: I always dread going for lab work at Kaiser Permanente because it’s so crowded and long waits. But seeing this 6% result is so relieving. Last time I was at six or below was when I was put on an aggressive medication plan using insulin for six months, after being discharged from the hospital with DKA for type 2.  Currently I’m on Metformin ER and Ozempic.
